snippet.title: Bub-O Burst | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to soon to Steam for PC and Mac https://store.steampowered.com/app/2968880/BubO_Burst/

Burst Bub-O’s bubbles to beat the bothersome Un- bub in this addictive modern arcade classic. You play as Bub-O, the little bubble blowing forest creature shooting and forming bubble trails to score the points he needs to escape the mischievous villain Un-bub. 
Bubble through all 40 screens! Enjoy charming cinematics in between the intense action. Rock out to the unique randomized "rogue-like" soundtrack by chiptune masters 8-Bit Weapon.

Sharpen your bubble blowing skils in the latest Bub-O outing.
